Class ib_FilterFlip

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.ib_a_Ops

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.BufferedImageOp

    public class ib_FilterFlip
extends ib_a_Ops
    A filter which flips images or rotates by multiples of 90 degrees.
